title: Center Text on Page
description: Create a page that displays a text message centered both vertically and horizontally.

title: Styled Button
description: Create a button with padding, background color, and rounded corners.

title: Image Display
description: Display an image that adjusts its size to fit inside a container.

title: Text Color Change
description: Change the color of a paragraph when a button is clicked.

title: Simple Alert
description: Show a popup message when a button is clicked.

title: Hide and Show Text
description: Create a button that hides and shows a text section.

title: List Styling
description: Create a list and apply spacing and custom bullet styles.

title: Change Font Size
description: Increase or decrease the font size of text using buttons.

title: Add Border
description: Add a border around a box with padding and margin.

title: Hover Effect
description: Change the appearance of a button when hovered.

title: Show Date
description: Display the current date on the page.

title: Toggle Text
description: Toggle between two different text messages when clicking a button.

title: Input Value Display
description: Display the value typed in an input field below it.

title: Change Background
description: Change the background color of a box when clicked.

title: Simple Counter
description: Create a counter that increases by one when clicking a button.

title: Show Image on Click
description: Display an image only after clicking a button.

title: Disable Button
description: Disable a button after it is clicked once.

title: Change Text Alignment
description: Change text alignment between left, center, and right.

title: Simple Card
description: Create a card with a title and description.

title: Show Hidden Content
description: Reveal hidden content when a button is clicked.

title: Background Color Toggle
description: Toggle the background color of the page between two colors using a button.

title: Responsive Card Layout
description: Create a responsive card layout with multiple items.

title: Form Validation
description: Validate input fields and show an error message if the input is empty.

title: Counter App
description: Create a counter with increment and decrement buttons.

title: Dropdown Toggle
description: Create a dropdown menu that opens and closes when clicked.

title: Character Counter
description: Display the number of characters typed inside an input field.

title: Theme Switcher
description: Switch between light and dark themes using a button.

title: Password Visibility Toggle
description: Toggle password visibility between hidden and visible.

title: Accordion Component
description: Create an accordion that expands and collapses sections.

title: Dynamic List
description: Add items dynamically to a list using an input field.

title: Remove List Item
description: Remove an item from a list when clicking a delete button.

title: Progress Bar
description: Create a progress bar that fills based on user interaction.

title: Image Preview
description: Preview an image after selecting a file.

title: Sticky Header
description: Create a header that stays visible while scrolling.

title: Tabs Navigation
description: Switch content sections using tab navigation.

title: Search Highlight
description: Highlight matching text based on search input.

title: Countdown Timer
description: Create a countdown timer that updates every second.

title: Disable Submit Button
description: Disable a submit button until all fields are filled.

title: Modal Trigger
description: Open a modal window when clicking a button.

title: Sortable List
description: Sort a list of items alphabetically when clicking a button.

title: Todo List
description: Create a task list where users can add and remove items.

title: Modal Popup
description: Create a modal popup that opens and closes when buttons are clicked.

title: Image Slider
description: Create an image slider with next and previous controls.

title: Search Filter
description: Filter a list of items based on text entered in a search field.

title: Tabs Component
description: Create a tab system where clicking a tab shows different content.

title: Form Submission Preview
description: Display entered form data on the page after submission without reloading.

title: Infinite Scroll
description: Load more content automatically when scrolling to the bottom.

title: Drag and Drop
description: Reorder list items using drag and drop.

title: Multi-Step Form
description: Create a form that progresses through multiple steps.

title: Theme Persistence
description: Save the selected theme and apply it on reload.

title: Image Gallery
description: Create an image gallery with clickable thumbnails.

title: Form Error Handling
description: Display validation messages for multiple form fields.

title: Dynamic Table
description: Generate a table dynamically based on data.

title: Keyboard Navigation
description: Enable keyboard navigation for interactive elements.

title: Custom Dropdown
description: Build a custom dropdown without native select elements.

title: Pagination
description: Split a list of items across multiple pages.

title: Toast Notification
description: Display a temporary notification message.

title: Live Search
description: Filter results instantly as the user types.

title: Resizable Panel
description: Resize a panel by dragging its edge.

title: Dashboard Layout
description: Create a dashboard with multiple interactive sections.
